item.title: Hello World (I'm Bored)
item.description: C++ #include <iostream> int main(int argc, char** argv) { std::cout << "Hello, World!" << std::endl; return 0; } Javascript / Typescript console.log("Hello, World!"); Java public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello, World!"); } } Python 3 print("Hello, World!") C# Console.WriteLine("Hello, World!"); So, Im bored at the moment. Its nearly time to sleep and yet Im working on repairing this blog (which has been neglected from its revamp).
